upcoming.title: UI/UX Refinement and Changes
upcoming.description: Enhancements to the user interface and user experience across the platform.

upcoming.title: Improvements to the virtual assistant (MEO)
upcoming.description: Implementing features to enhance the overall functionality and user experience of the virtual assistant.

major.title: AI-Powered MEO Assistant Integration
major.description: Integrated AI API requests into the virtual assistant (MEO). When user input doesn't match predefined responses, MEO now fetches AI-generated replies with intelligent request throttling and enhanced input handling.

major.title: Advanced Query Recognition System
major.description: Implemented sophisticated keyword matching using stemming, synonyms, and n-gram similarity algorithms for significantly improved user query recognition accuracy.

minor.title: Enhanced Conversation Quality
minor.description: Improved MEO's response generation algorithms for more engaging and natural conversations.

minor.title: MEO Functionality Improvements
minor.description: Various adjustments and optimizations to enhance the virtual assistant's overall functionality and performance.

major.title: Voice Recognition Integration
major.description: Added comprehensive voice recognition capabilities to the virtual assistant, enabling hands-free interaction and voice commands.

minor.title: Dialogue Management Enhancement
minor.description: Significant improvements to the virtual assistant's dialogue management system for better conversation flow and context awareness.

minor.title: UI/UX Refinements
minor.description: Updated user interface and experience elements specifically for the virtual assistant module.

major.title: MEO Virtual Assistant Launch
major.description: Introducing MEO, a comprehensive virtual assistant designed to assist and engage users with personalized conversations, providing a unique interactive experience throughout the platform.

minor.title: General UI/UX Improvements
minor.description: Various user interface and user experience improvements and refinements to enhance the overall platform usability.

upcoming.title: Character Profile Expansion
upcoming.description: Refined profiles and comprehensive detailed information for new characters: Evany, Arzhel, Shelain, Molag, Zenyx, Evalete, Zackcry, Jazen, and Zenki.

minor.title: Character Panel UI Refinement
minor.description: Enhanced the user interface of the character panel with improved character information display and better visual organization.

upcoming.title: New Character Additions
upcoming.description: New characters 'Ren' and 'Blessica' will be added to the character selection roster.

minor.title: Character Selection Logic Enhancement
minor.description: Improved character selection algorithms for better usability, performance, and user experience.

minor.title: Visual Consistency Improvements
minor.description: Applied character-specific accent colors to both selection panel overlay and info panel for enhanced visual consistency across the interface.

minor.title: Interactive Filter Indicators
minor.description: Added active state visual indicators for filter role buttons when selected, improving user feedback.

minor.title: Settings Profile Layout
minor.description: Refined profile layout and styling within the settings menu for better organization and readability.

upcoming.title: Character Information Refinement
upcoming.description: Comprehensive updates to character information and details.

upcoming.title: Blessica Character Addition
upcoming.description: New character 'Blessica' will be integrated into the character selection system.

minor.title: Comprehensive UI/UX Overhaul
minor.description: Platform-wide design adjustments and user experience improvements for better overall usability.

minor.title: White Theme Color Refinement
minor.description: Adjustments and improvements to white theme color scheme for better readability and visual appeal.

minor.title: Popup System Enhancement
minor.description: Complete refinement of popup UI and UX with standardized rounded corners, improved animations, consistent blur overlays, and smoother transitions.

minor.title: Character Selection UI Polish
minor.description: Additional refinements and adjustments to the character selection interface for improved user interaction.

major.title: Advanced Character Selection System
major.description: Comprehensive enhancement of character selection logic with new features including toggle hide/show functionality, minimize/maximize panels, and significantly improved character information display.

minor.title: Enhanced Accent Color System
minor.description: Added sophisticated accent color selection functionality with character-specific theming capabilities.

minor.title: Character Selection Optimization
minor.description: Multiple adjustments and optimizations to character selection algorithms and user interaction flow.

minor.title: Improved Character Filtering
minor.description: Enhanced character filter functionality with better sorting and search capabilities.

minor.title: Smooth Transition Animations
minor.description: Added fluid transition animations to hide/show functionality throughout the character selection system.

major.title: Complete Character Filter System
major.description: Character filter system is now fully functional with comprehensive filtering options. Additional enhancements and features are planned for future releases.

minor.title: Character Selection Responsiveness
minor.description: Improved character selection logic for enhanced responsiveness and accuracy in user interactions.

minor.title: Carousel Performance Optimization
minor.description: Optimized carousel functionality for smoother transitions and improved overall performance.

minor.title: Commission Sheet Filter Enhancement
minor.description: Streamlined commission sheet filtering system for enhanced usability and better user experience.

minor.title: Contact Form Improvements
minor.description: Refined contact form interactions with improved validation logic and user feedback mechanisms.

minor.title: Navigation Logic Enhancement
minor.description: Enhanced navigation system for more intuitive user experience and improved site flow.

minor.title: Popup Behavior Optimization
minor.description: Polished popup behavior to ensure consistent display, improved performance, and better user interaction.

minor.title: Portfolio Filter Optimization
minor.description: Optimized portfolio filtering algorithms for faster processing and more accurate search results.

minor.title: Search Functionality Enhancement
minor.description: Improved search functionality with better relevance algorithms and increased search speed.

minor.title: Slideshow Control Optimization
minor.description: Streamlined slideshow transitions and control logic for smoother user experience.

minor.title: Theme and Translation Improvements
minor.description: Refined theme selection system and enhanced multilingual translation handling capabilities.

minor.title: General UI/UX Adjustments
minor.description: Platform-wide user interface and user experience design adjustments for improved overall usability.

bugfixes.title: General Bug Fixes
bugfixes.description: Resolved various minor bugs and issues reported by users to improve platform stability.
